name: RESEND__SEND_EMAIL
description: Start sending emails through the Resend Email API.

body.description: Body parameters for the email request

scheduled_at.description: Schedule email to be sent later. The date should be in natural language (e.g.: in 1 min) or ISO 8601 format (e.g: 2024-08-05T11:52:01.858Z).

reply_to.description: Reply-to email address(es). Can be a single email or an array of emails.

html.description: The HTML version of the message

text.description: The plain text version of the message

tags.description: Custom data passed in key/value pairs

name.description: The name of the email tag

value.description: The value of the email tag

id.description: The ID of the email to retrieve

name: RESEND__SEND_BATCH_EMAILS
description: Trigger up to 100 batch emails at once.

body.description: Array of email objects to send in batch

scheduled_at.description: Schedule email to be sent later. The date should be in natural language (e.g.: in 1 min) or ISO 8601 format (e.g: 2024-08-05T11:52:01.858Z).

reply_to.description: Reply-to email address(es). Can be a single email or an array of emails.

html.description: The HTML version of the message

text.description: The plain text version of the message

tags.description: Custom data passed in key/value pairs

name.description: The name of the email tag

value.description: The value of the email tag

id.description: The ID of the email to update

body.description: Body parameters for the email update request

scheduled_at.description: Schedule email to be sent later. The date should be in ISO 8601 format (e.g: 2024-08-05T11:52:01.858Z).

id.description: The ID of the email to cancel

name: RESEND__CREATE_DOMAIN
description: Add a domain to your Resend account.

body.description: Body parameters for the domain creation request

region.description: The region to create the domain in

id.description: The ID of the domain to retrieve
The ID of the domain to verify
The ID of the domain to update

body.description: Body parameters for the domain update request

name: RESEND__LIST_DOMAINS
description: Returns a list of your domains.

id.description: The ID of the domain to delete

name: RESEND__CREATE_API_KEY
description: Add a new API key to authenticate communications with Resend.

body.description: Body parameters for the API key creation request

permission.description: The API key permission level (full_access or sending_access)

domain_id.description: Restrict API key to send emails only from a specific domain (only used with sending_access permission)

name: RESEND__LIST_API_KEYS
description: Retrieve a list of API keys for the authenticated user.

api_key_id.description: The API key ID to delete

body.description: Body parameters for the audience creation request

name.description: The name of the audience you want to create

id.description: The ID of the audience to retrieve
The ID of the audience to delete

name: RESEND__CREATE_CONTACT
description: Add a contact to an audience.

audience_id.description: The ID of the audience to add the contact to

body.description: Body parameters for the contact creation request

audience_id.description: The ID of the audience containing the contact

id.description: The ID of the contact to retrieve

audience_id.description: The ID of the audience containing the contact

id.description: The ID of the contact to update

body.description: Body parameters for the contact update request

audience_id.description: The ID of the audience containing the contact

id.description: The ID of the contact to delete

name: RESEND__LIST_CONTACTS
description: Returns a list of contacts for an audience.

audience_id.description: The ID of the audience to list contacts from

name: RESEND__CREATE_BROADCAST
description: Create a new broadcast to send to your audience.

body.description: Body parameters for the broadcast creation request

audience_id.description: The ID of the audience you want to send to

from.description: Sender email address. To include a friendly name, use the format "Your Name <sender@domain.com>"

reply_to.description: Reply-to email address(es). Can be a single email or an array of emails

html.description: The HTML version of the message

text.description: The plain text version of the message

name.description: The friendly name of the broadcast. Only used for internal reference

id.description: The ID of the broadcast to retrieve

name: RESEND__SEND_BROADCAST
description: Start sending broadcasts to your audience through the Resend API.

body.description: Body parameters for the send broadcast request

scheduled_at.description: Schedule email to be sent later. The date should be in natural language (e.g.: in 1 min) or ISO 8601 format (e.g: 2024-08-05T11:52:01.858Z)

id.description: The ID of the broadcast to delete

name: RESEND__LIST_BROADCASTS
description: Returns a list of your broadcasts.
